[title_desc name="Half-Nuked Source Code" desc="Here\'s the source code of Half-Nuked, I just don\'t have a lot of time to dedicate to this mod and I don\'t think I\'ll work further on it, feel free to toy around with it, or even continuing it\'s development, that\'s up to you." /]

[title_desc name="Gunman WC Mappack" desc="Around 300 maps from the development of Gunman Chronicles. This is nowhere near the full map sources of the game, it is just what I\'ve been able to gather." /]

[title_desc name="Autonomy Lost map source files" desc="These are all the map source files for Autonomy Lost. Please note that they\'re in the JMF file format which requires the J.A.C.K. editor in order for them to work. Read the readme.txt for more info." /]
